data.name: Subcube Demo
data.detailed_description: Subcube is a puzzle game designed to make your brain nervous system a Gordian knot. The goal is to construct cubes by rotating blocks on a board. Use your imagination and creativity and push your spatial awareness to its limits in order to solve the puzzles
data.about_the_game: Subcube is a puzzle game designed to make your brain nervous system a Gordian knot. The goal is to construct cubes by rotating blocks on a board. Use your imagination and creativity and push your spatial awareness to its limits in order to solve the puzzles
data.short_description: ubcube is a puzzle game designed to make your brain nervous system a Gordian knot. The goal is to construct cubes by rotating blocks on a board. Use your imagination and creativity and push your spatial awareness to its limits in order to solve the puzzles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Core2Duo 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: openl 3 compatible video card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: linux 64 bit
  • Processor: Core2Duo 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: openl 3 compatible video card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
